alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 8:21AM CST until March 07 at 1:20AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. .The Gasconade River at Jerome will fall below flood stage this afternoon. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Jerome. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, minor flooding occurs near the gage site. Flood waters reach the lower edge of the concrete building where the gage equipment is located. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 4.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
